item.title: Report X-2024061520
item.description:
Report X-2024061520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE BROKE OPEN REQUIRING A REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER BOXES PREPRINTED LEVEL 1 AEROSOLS. EACH INNER BOX CONTAINS TWELVE AEROSOL CANS OF AX-IT BASEBOARD STRIPPER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 729443, E. A. MORSE CO. INC., 1210 ROUTE 9, CASTLETON ON HUDSON NY 12033-9686.

item.title: Report E-2024060425
item.description:
Report E-2024060425

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-01
  • City: NEW HARTFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5100
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE SHIPPING FROM NEW HARTFORD, NY TO SYRACUSE, NY BROKE OPEN REQUIRING A PACKAGE REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION A MC LEOD GAGE DEVICE CONTAINING MERCURY HAD BROKEN. AN OUTSIDE RESPONSE TEAM WAS CONTACTED. THE OUTSIDE RESPONDER CONTAINED, CLEANED, AND REMOVED THE PACKAGE AND CONTENTS FROM THE FACILITY. NO EVACUATION OF THE FACILITY WAS NEEDED AND NO INJURIES WERE REPORTED. THE OUTSIDE RESPONDER ADVISED AN ESTIMATED FIVE POUNDS OF MERCURY WAS CONTAINED IN THE MC LEOD GAGE DEVICE WITH APPROXIMATELY 30 ML (1 OZ) OF MERCURY RELEASING. THERE WERE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS OFFERED FOR AIR SERVICE BUT ONLY MOVED IN THE GROUND NETWORK PRIOR TO THE LEAKAGE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report E-2024060407
item.description:
Report E-2024060407

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-17
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO CNW, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 3-ounces of Bostik 1231J was released from one (1) 5-gallon metal drum impacting the trailer floor. The cause was due to a forklift accident. ERTS reviewed the SDS with terminal personnel, a contractor was advised but decline by the terminal. The terminal cleaned the impacted area with the available PPE on site. The waste was containerized into one (1) 35-gallon poly drum for disposal.
